pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion.
pre_caption: The video begins with a view of a street corner, showing a silver car parked in front of a house with a blue and beige exterior. The camera slowly pans to the left, revealing more of the street and additional houses. As the camera continues to move, a black car parked on the left side of the street comes into view, along with a small shop or building with a white sign and some plants outside. The street is lined with utility poles and wires, and the background shows more houses and buildings in the distance.
